title: KREMNI GEL ZA PRHANJE, COCONUT MILK, AFRODITA, 250 ML

product-info.opis: Sladko razvajanje pod prho! Z izvlečki kokosa in biolipidom koži nudi 24h intenzivno nego ter jo naredi neverjetno mehko. Vonj kokosa zapelje v tropski svet ter zagotavlja nepozabno negovalno izkušnjo.- paraben & paraffin & silicone FREE- skin-friendly pH

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Cocos Nucifera Fruit Juice, Polyquaternium-10, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchlorothiazolinone, Limonene

contact-information.kontakt:: Kozmetika Afrodita d.o.o., Kidričeva 54, 3250 Rogaška Slatina, Slovenija
